advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Five-star app - as seen on App Judgment, International Business Times, and Reddit.

Experience time in unexpected ways with the Versaries™ app. Type a date or event into the Versaries Interactive Time Machine and the app will calculate upcoming Versary™ Milestones: whether it's the 1 Billionth Second since you were born, the exact moment when you have been married longer than you were single, or a milestone moment until your retirement - the Versaries app lets you discover Versary Milestones worth celebrating. Now you can share those Versary moments by creating your own Walgreens photo cards and pick them up at your local Walgreens store.  

• People •
Add friends, family, and yourself to the Versaries app and the Versaries Time Machine discovers Versary Milestones for you all.

• Events •
Add special events from the past and future – a first date, pet adoptions, weddings, concerts, new jobs, baby due dates, retirements and more. The Versaries Time Machine will uncover and alert you to upcoming milestones related to events.

• Alerts •
Never miss Versary milestones by setting alerts. Alerts are fully customizable, allowing notifications from one month to five minutes before a Versary Milestone happens. Never miss a birthday or anniversary!

• Social Networks •
Facebook and Twitter integration allows you to share Versary milestones with your friends. Post on a wall or to a feed; each Versary Milestone you share features an online Time Machine that friends can see in real time.

• Interactive Time Machine •
Every Versary Milestone has a unique Interactive Time Machine that displays time in seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, and years. The Versaries Time Machine is a robust date calculator too; just flip the wheel to convert any unit of time to another.

• Create-a-Card •
Versaries App now lets you share special occasions with Walgreens Create-a-Card! Use the built-in card editor to create  custom high quality photo cards and pick them up the same day at any Walgreens store.
trackCensoredName: Versaries: Time Machine with Photo Cards
